name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 25, a netizen posted on Xiaohongshu that he wanted to visit the "European Town" of Huawei's Dongguan headquarters, but he received an administrative warning from Huawei.
The netizen said that he wanted to take his children to visit Huawei's headquarters, but he couldn't find the reservation entrance. Seeing that there were many posts on Xianyu asking for a tour, he also posted one. Unexpectedly, he received an administrative warning from Huawei.
It is reported that Huawei's European Town in Xiliu Beipo Village, Songshan Lake, Dongguan, was built according to 12 European towns or classic buildings such as Oxford, Windermere, Luxembourg, Bruges, Fribourg, Burgundy, Verona, Paris, Granada, Bologna, Heidelberg, and Kleinnov, with a total construction area of 1.26 million square meters. Through online searches, you can see many guides for visiting European towns. However, the area is not actually open to the public as Huawei's office area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich ETH announced strict security checks on Chinese students, which means that Chinese students will have almost no chance of enrolling in the school's science, technology, engineering or mathematics (STEM) majors in the future.
The school was founded in 1855 and is known for its rigorous academics and outstanding scientific research. It has trained many Nobel Prize winners, including Einstein.
In addition to China, Afghanistan, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Syria, North Korea, Russia, Sudan, Venezuela and other countries are also included in the review

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, two jumping incidents occurred in Qingdao Binhai College, resulting in one death and one injury. According to students, the reason for the students jumping off the building was that they had a mental breakdown due to the school's strict management system.
Afterwards, the school immediately blocked the news, and the angry students expressed their dissatisfaction with the school management by posting posters and exposing it online.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, there is no further update on Shabai's personal account, but the profile picture has changed from color to black and white.
At the same time, the Weibo topic #The profile picture of the woman who went to Switzerland for euthanasia has become black and white# was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, India and China said they had reached an agreement on the Himalayan border issue. Neither side disclosed the details of the agreement.
However, the topic of "China and India reach a solution to the border issue" has been banned on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 26, Jing'an Temple, Shanghai. A man wearing Hanfu was stopped by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 26, a Russian military recording intercepted by Ukraine showed that the Russian military seemed overwhelmed by the sudden arrival of North Korean soldiers and called them "damn Chinese."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 25 (Released) The mercenary "Red Macron" who went to Russia revealed in a live broadcast that he came to help Russia with good intentions, but was racially discriminated against by the other side, and had to chop wood and do odd jobs every day, while the Russians did not have to work, and would be treated harshly if they refused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. Embassy in China said that China's production far exceeds domestic demand and it is dumping excess capacity on the global market at artificially low prices, forcing manufacturers around the world to go bankrupt and choking the supply chain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 25, Sing Tao Daily quoted South Korean sources as saying that the monthly salary of North Korean soldiers supporting Russia reached 2,000 US dollars, which is 23 times the average income of North Korea. Netizens responded: "I treat the general like a kind father, and the general takes me in exchange for rubles"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Professor Zhang Weiwei was giving a lecture at Fudan University and was surrounded by students. Everyone rushed to take photos with Zhang Weiwei.
In response, netizens responded, "This generation of young people is finished," "If this is Fudan University, I think Fudan University is finished," and "If my son dares to take a photo with him, I will slap him a few times."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 26, Shanghai. A netizen said he received a call from the police station, who asked him if he had recently purchased a mental illness costume on Taobao, and told him that it would be best not to wear such a costume to Halloween, as it would "have a bad impact".

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 26, Zhejiang. A Taiwanese posted a video to "refute the rumor" that Shanghai cannot celebrate Halloween: As long as you don't wear strange costumes and don't violate the law by gathering or parading, you can celebrate the festival however you want. "How did it get spread that Shanghai banned Halloween?" Don't let rumors spread.
